specs.title: Create and publish a basic announcement

annotations.description: Verifies that an admin can create and publish an announcement.

specs.title: Create and save announcement as draft

annotations.description: Verifies that an announcement can be saved as a draft.
Verifies that a draft announcement can be updated and published.
Verifies that an announcement can be created with acknowledgment required.

specs.title: Create announcement from wall for organization

annotations.description: Verifies that an announcement can be created from the company wall.
Verifies that an announcement can be scheduled for a future date.
Verifies that an announcement can be scheduled to publish later.

specs.title: Create announcement with pixel image upload

annotations.description: Verifies that an announcement can be created with a pixel image.

specs.title: Verify announcement appears on dashboard after publishing

annotations.description: Ensures that a published announcement appears on the dashboard.

specs.title: Create announcement without description and verify error message

annotations.description: Verifies that an error message is displayed when creating an announcement without a description.

specs.title: Create announcement without title and verify error message

annotations.description: Verifies that an error message is displayed when creating an announcement without a title.

specs.title: Create announcement with special characters in title

annotations.description: Verifies the system's handling of special characters in the announcement title.

specs.title: Create announcement with maximum title length

annotations.description: Verifies that an announcement title cannot exceed the maximum character limit.

specs.title: Disable manage announcement permission for HR Manager

annotations.description: Ensures that an HR Manager cannot manage announcements when the permission is disabled.
